moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Execute net user /ADD CMD
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Create a new user and add them to local administration group.

        Note: The specified password is checked for common complexity
        requirements to prevent the target machine rejecting the user
        for failing to meet policy requirements.

        Complexity check: 8-14 chars (1 UPPER, 1 lower, 1 digit/special)
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
scriptjunkie
Chris John Riley

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: CreateSession
options.description: Create a new session for every successful login

options.name: InitialAutoRunScript
options.description: An initial script to run on session creation (before AutoRunScript)

options.name: AutoRunScript
options.description: A script to run automatically on session creation.

options.name: CommandShellCleanupCommand
options.description: A command to run before the session is closed

options.name: CUSTOM
options.description: Custom group name to be used instead of default

options.name: WMIC
options.description: Use WMIC on the target to resolve administrators group
